MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the KA2 postcode area of Crosshouse. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 9:30am. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:17am on Thursday, 07 January 2021
